personalities.name: Name
personalities.title: Personalities
personalities.requiredFieldsDescription: All personality data including name, problem summaries, and personality descriptions in both English and Czech are required. These fields ensure the AI can properly understand and respond to users in their preferred language with the correct personality context.
personalities.namePlaceholder: Enter personality name (e.g., Dr. Sarah Thompson)
personalities.problemSummaryEnPlaceholder: Describe the main problem or situation this personality addresses (in English). This is used by the AI for the roleplaying and communication purposes.
personalities.problemSummaryCsPlaceholder: Describe the main problem or situation this personality addresses (in Czech). This helps the user to understand the personality and its role in the conversation.
personalities.personalityDescriptionEnPlaceholder: Detailed description of the personality's character, speaking style, expertise, and approach (in English). This defines how the AI will behave and communicate.
personalities.personalityDescriptionCsPlaceholder: Podrobný popis charakteru osobnosti, stylu mluvení, odbornosti a přístupu (v češtině). To definuje, jak se bude AI chovat a komunikovat.
personalities.elevenlabsVoiceIdPlaceholder: ElevenLabs voice ID for custom voice
personalities.voiceInstructionsPlaceholder: Special instructions for voice generation (tone, pace, emphasis, etc.)
personalities.fieldRequired: is required and cannot be empty.
